sink.preCopyScript:
truncate table [stg].[credits]
  truncate table [stg].[ratings]
  truncate table [stg].[movies_metadata]

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
  coalesce(WatermarkValue, '1970-01-01') as WatermarkValue
FROM (
  SELECT 
    MAX(WatermarkValue) as WatermarkValue
  FROM [dbo].[watermarktable]
  ) ds;
